## Utils.isVendorModule() method

Is the `mn` a `vendor module` name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isVendorModule(mn: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mn | string | The module name to be test |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
